p: The changes in the signaling events were assessed by Western blotting. Western blot analysis suggested that Cd exposure significantly ( p < 0.001) upregulated the NF-κB p65, iNOS, and Smad2 mRNA expression as compared with the reference group. TSA oil treatment significantly downregulated the p65, NF-κB, iNOS, and Smad2 mRNA expression in a dose-dependent manner relative to rats subjected to Cd exposure only ( Figure 3A–C).
